Installation

Prerequisites

  • Python 3.8+

  • (List any other requirements)

Installing with pip

pip install my-project-name

Installing from source

git clone https://github.com/yourusername/your-repo.git
cd your-repo
pip install -e .

Verifying installation

import my_project
print(my_project.__version__)
